creditline: Gift of Lucille and Arthur Weiss
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: One in a group of seven spindle whorls, having incised designs, some on top, bottom and sides, others on top and sides ceramic.    .4 (199/4) L.3/4, Diam. 1-7/8 in.
title: Spindle Whorl, one of seven
